etymology.description: 亼(亼) (jí, "gather") + 吅(吅) (xuān, "shout") + 从(从) (cóng, "follow") = people responding unanimously -> unanimous agreement
etymology.interpretation: This character visually combines elements representing gathering, shouting, and following, which effectively conveys a sense of collective response or unanimous agreement. The inclusion of 僉(僉) (qiān) has maintained this meaning, reflecting a collective action by multiple individuals.
etymology.simplification: 佥(僉) retains the original components but was simplified with slightly altered strokes for easier writing, maintaining its semantic essence.

examples.chinese: 同学佥完成了作业(同學僉完成了作業)。
家人佥为他庆祝生日(家人僉為他慶祝生日)。
examples.pinyin: Jiārén qiān wéi tā qìngzhù shēngrì.
examples.english: All family members celebrated his birthday.

examples.chinese: 朋友佥送上真诚的祝福(朋友僉送上真誠的祝福)。
examples.pinyin: Péngyǒu qiān sòng shàng zhēnchéng de zhùfú.
